name: Four-Sided Flurry
description:
Four Sided Flurry is a wave-based platform shooter (and sorta roguelike), made for GeoJam 2022!

Your gun is a four-sided dice, and after every level, you can pick what weapons come up on each side. Every six shots, you reroll!

Controls:

  • A and D/Left and Right - Movement
  • Space/Z/L - Jump
  • Down/S - Hold to fall through platforms
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Left Click - Shoot
